column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////4.  The brioche wild berry French toast was good
column2: but nothing special.  Both my wife and I had better
column3: and it was not at the top of our favorites list
column4: for French toast that is.  The flavor and texture just did not come out.  (Sorry
column5: I do not have a list of restaurants to recommend for excellent French toast.)
